main event: Mr. I. E. Smith reported sighting a flying saucer while working on the railroad in Lorain, Ohio in 1967.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 302 seconds., There was one object reported., The sighting was ground-visual (assisted)., The witness had three other witnesses., The witness requested confidentiality and does not want publicity.
witness description: Mr. I. E. Smith, a railroad worker, known to the relief officer and of sound mind.
